After launching its Windows desktop app earlier this year,
WhatsApp is now available for Mac users as a native app.
articles.content: Producer:  Priyanka DasEditor: Manuj Yadav

articles.title: JioBharat K1 Karbonn 4G Now Available for Users at Rs 999, Check Features - TelecomTalk
articles.description: Reliance Jio had recently announced the arrival of the JioBharat phone platform. Now, you can purchase the phones from Amazon.
articles.content: Reliance Jio had recently announced the arrival of the JioBharat phone platform. Now, you can purchase the phones from Amazon. The JioBharat K1 Karbonn 4G is available on Amazon for Rs 999, only. It … [+1747 chars]
